formalpara.title: Iteration 1, Test cases C144, C145
formalpara.para: The DropUnmd function does not appear to properly handle the empty case for certain catenation reductions.

formalpara.title: Iteration 2, Test cases C144, C145
formalpara.para: The LiftConsts has a domain error. Likely caused by a failure in output returned by DropUnmed function.

formalpara.title: Iteration 3, Test cases C144, C145
formalpara.para: There is an error when generating the namespace in the system. The error that we get is the U error, and I am not sure what that means. After examination of the ErrorMessage function and fixing a problem with that, the real message is Unable to find target for this triple (no targets are registered) which makes much more sense.

formalpara.title: Iteration 4, Test case 1
formalpara.para: There is a domain error in FindFunction on line 38 of ModToNs which appears to be related to an empty ‚çµ value. That is, it does not appear that the names of the functions are actually given to ModToNS.

formalpara.title: Iteration 5, Test Case 23
formalpara.para: The system does not appear to correctly handle Generation a function with more than a single name. there is a VALUE ERROR that occurs at GenGlobal[4] when trying to do this.
